title: Technology-Enhanced Contextualized Grammar Instruction: A Task-Based Approach for Second Language Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental second-language grammar knowledge and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing grammatical contextualization through real-life application

learning_goals: Learners can apply given grammar rules to real-life scenarios (photo essays, brochures, etc.)
Learners correct over 80% of grammar errors identified during peer assessment processes
Learners systematically share and manage learning outcomes using social media platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
